title: Remove CCS logo imagery from header, footer, and favicon

requirements.summary: Remove CCS logo image from the header brand area while keeping brand text and Home scroll behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The header brand area still provides a clickable control to scroll to the Home section.
Header layout remains aligned and visually balanced on mobile and desktop breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Remove the brand that references /assets/generated/ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png and adjust the brand button layout so it remains a clickable text-only control that scrolls to the Home section, keeping spacing/alignment balanced across mobile and desktop.

requirements.summary: Remove CCS logo image from the footer brand block while preserving brand text and clean spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer brand block spacing/alignment looks correct without the image.

file_operations.description: Remove the footer brand that references /assets/generated/ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png and update the surrounding flex/gap/typography wrappers so the brand text block remains well-aligned with appropriate spacing without the image.

requirements.summary: Remove the generated CCS favicon reference from the HTML entry file.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer references /assets/generated/ccs-favicon.dim_64x64.png as the favicon.

file_operations.description: Remove the <link rel="icon"> reference to /assets/generated/ccs-favicon.dim_64x64.png so the site no longer uses the generated CCS logo favicon.
